sentences.en: He had given up attending lectures out of sheer boredom.
sentences.cn: 他已经不再去听讲座了，纯粹出于厌倦。

sentences.en: Where people were concerned, his threshold of boredom was low.
sentences.cn: 涉及人的事情，他便极易感到厌烦。

sentences.en: Television helps to relieve the boredom of the long winter evenings.
sentences.cn: 电视有助于打发漫长无聊的冬夜。
